ai-ya8.2.3:0.3_0: I’ll reject the basic support of the mind,
ai-ya8.2.3:1.1_0: Someone whose mind is skillful does not arise; their mind does not cease.
ai-ya8.2.3:2.1_0: Their mind does not arise in the last part of the mind; the skillful does not cease.
ai-ya8.2.3:3.1_0: Or else they’re not able to discern the training ...
ai-ya8.2.3:4.1_0: When an unskillful mind ceases, what ceases and stops.
ai-ya8.2.3:5.1_0: the root of the mind, and the three all the times, just as much as they fall.
ai-ya8.2.3:6.1_0: The canonical text of the mind is finished.
